General.Name: Acbel Polytech Inc
General.Description: AcBel Polytech Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells power management solutions worldwide. It provides a range of custom design and power supplies ranging from 3W up to 10,000W per power module. The company offers industrial PSUs, adapters, medical PSUs, telecom PSUs, and EV power solutions, as well as operates solar farms. Its products are used in various applications including information technology, communication, consumer electronics, networks, and industrial automation. The company was formerly known as API Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AcBel Polytech Inc. in 1998. AcBel Polytech Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 18, , Zhongyang S Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 112030
